title: Girl, 8, injured in late-night shooting in Wells-Goodfellow neig - KMOV.com
content:
ST. LOUIS (KMOV.com) - A girl was injured during a shooting in the Wells-Goodfellow neighborhood Wednesday night.
The 8-year-old suffered a graze wound to her right cheek while in the area of St. Louis Avenue and Goodfellow Boulevard around 11:30 p.m.
According to police, the girl was inside a vehicle with her mother and a man at a stoplight when a newer model four-door navy blue or black Nissan pulled up and a passenger inside began shooting at a large SUV that was parked near their vehicle.
After realizing the girl was struck, she was driven to a nearby hospital, where she was treated and listed in stable condition.
The gunfire also shattered the victims' vehicle's rear windshield, police said.
No other information has been released.
